description: Main entry point and UI scaffold for the Flutter frontend of the preference matchmaker app; sets up providers, routes, and main app structure.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Flutter application, sets theme, providers, and routes.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with app bar and body content.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of MyHomePage, including the app bar and body.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the respective widget (_MyHomePageState or MyApp).
